contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, Katy Ansite, co-host of the web series “Just the Tips: Taking the Internet’s Advice Seriously,” talks tech and takes the test.

Play along at home, below.
title: New Year's hangover edition: This week's Silicon Tally
teaser: 32,256 LED lights,  4.6 million phone numbers and $6.99 ... know what those numbers mean? Must be another Silicon Tally!
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, January 3, 2014
description: 32,256 LED lights,  4.6 million phone numbers and $6.99 ... know what those numbers mean? Must be another Silicon Tally!
